plot: Michael is a young man dealing with a personal invasion of his mind and body by alien slug creatures. He must do something to save himself before it's too late.
title: Brain Maggots from Outer Space
plot_es: Michael is a young man dealing with a personal invasion of his mind and body by alien slug creatures. He must do something to save himself before it's too late.
plot_en: Michael is a young man dealing with a personal invasion of his mind and body by alien slug creatures. He must do something to save himself before it's too late.
